name: 'ELR' - "Bad Moon Rising" Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Whose idea was it to tape Debra when she was having one of her mood swings?
questions.explanation:
Gianni.

	Gianni suggested that Ray should tape Debra so she could hear what she sounds like when she's yelling at him. Robert offered to shave Ray down and set him up with a wire.

questions.text: What nickname did Ray call Debra when he came home from Nemo's?
questions.explanation:
Banjo pants.

	Ray had brought home dinner from Nemo's Italian restaurant so Debra wouldn't have to cook, but she had already started dinner.

questions.text: Finish the quote made by Raymond. "If they find me _______ up in the _______, don't believe the suicide note."
questions.explanation:
chopped; freezer.

	Ray made this comment in the beginning of the show after Debra had yelled at him about not putting his pants in the hamper.

questions.text: What words did Frank use to describe Debra's ladies days?
questions.explanation:
The enemy within & Enemy within.

	At the beginning of the episode, Robert, Frank, Andy, Gianni, and Robert were all in the living room watching TV when Ray told them that Debra wasn't feeling well. Frank told them there wasn't a day he didn't pray for a comet to bring him sweet relief.

questions.text: Did Debra slap Ray because of the way he was acting?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Debra didn't slap Ray because Marie slapped Ray. She slapped him a second time when she thought he was acting like his father. That's the first time on the show that Marie had ever slapped Ray.

questions.text: When Ray played back the tape he made of Debra, why was she yelling at him?
questions.correct: He left lint in the dryer
options: For taping her with a tape recorder
Gianni dropped sauce on the couch and Ray didn't tell her
He took the wrong twin to the hospital
questions.explanation:
He left lint in the dryer.

	When Debra returned home from her shopping trip with Amy, Ray played her a tape he had made of her yelling at him. He made the tape after the guys left his house that afternoon. Debra started crying and called him a derfwad.

questions.text: When Marie took the "magic pills" that Ray brought home, what item of Frank's mysteriously cleaned itself up?
questions.correct: Frank's toenails went into the garbage
options: Frank started cleaning up after himself
Frank's laundry went into the hamper
Frank started taking a bath every day
questions.explanation:
Frank's toenails went into the garbage.

	Robert told Ray that the drug store had a whole aisle on medicine to relieve 'ladies days' so Ray brought Debra some pills. When Debra took them, Ray's clothes miraculously went into the hamper.

questions.text: When Debra was yelling at Ray over the dumb things he had done in their married life, what was NOT one of the things she mentioned?
questions.correct: Freezing Ally's hamster in a box of Popsicles
options: Asking the nurse if the TV had ESPN while Debra was in labor
questions.explanation:
Freezing Ally's hamster in a box of Popsicles.

	Debra: "Yeah, guess what? It's even longer when you're trying to push two human beings out of your body while your husband's going. 'Does this hospital have Fudgesicles?' Yeah, where's my tape recorder, huh? Or when you ask me why I get so upset because I find your underpants in the kitchen, huh? Or when you started snoring at my grandmother's funeral? Or when you taped a football game over our wedding video!?"

questions.text: During the episode's last argument that Ray and Debra had, what calmed her down?
options: Robert and the guys came in to watch football
Ally woke up and wanted to know what daddy did
She saw Marie looking through the window
questions.explanation:
Amy called.

	Debra had Ray cornered in the living room yelling at him when Amy called. Debra picked up the phone and started talking and laughing over the phone about a dress Amy went back to the store to buy. When Debra hung up the phone, Ray wanted to know if they could put Amy on speedial.

questions.text: Did the idea to tape Marie yelling at him work for Frank?
questions.explanation:
No.

	When Frank played the tape for Marie so she could hear herself yelling at him, the plan backfired and it taped Frank yelling at Marie. Every time he played it for Marie, it would have something different that Frank was yelling about.
